body_html: @ngimel @csarofeen I'm trying out cudnn 7.1.3 since this seems to be the one available for Power. PyTorch links and build but I'm getting : RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED when running test_cuda.TestCuda.test_stft and test_cat_empty (only difference is I am running on a Pascal GPU for now) This could be a separate problem. What I wanted to ask is did you try and build PyTorch on Power or were your replies based on x86 ? (edited for new information) I just ran the tests on a Power 9 with Volta gpu and I did not get the error. So I am thinking 7.1.3 is only for Volta GPU? Is this correct ?
